reviews.review: Ну такое... могли бы и лучше !)
Trust Factor messes up the whole game, things not even related to the game can ruin CS

I’ve been playing this bucket for five years. A hotbed of rosism, toxicity and cheaters. The Supports do nothing. The prime account does not work, because the cheaters were as they are. Gabe can only eat his burgers, but can not finally put a normal anti-cheat, and this is one of the main games of Valve .... NIXIYA NE IZMENILOS'
It's just one of the best games ever :D

I created this new account to play as a smurf, bought prime. It detects me well, get me a red hot Trust Factor when joining my friend's lobby just after first few games. This helps me to quickly skip playing with indeed noobs but other Smurfs in the universe, immediately enjoy my actual rank matchmaking in a clone account. 
5/5 would create new accounts again.
i like game csgo. just play AK and rush b

0/10 unplayable if Valve doesnt develop a proper anti cheat system. They say VAC is good, we have overwatch system etc. but all bulls***. Almost every game there is one cheater and those mfs dont even try to hide it. Ruin your 40 days and your rank that you worked hard for it.

В целом игра очень интересная, красочная, особенно при наличии прайм статуса ибо без него могут попадаться читеры, из минусов также странная система ранкеда и неучитываются бустеры и читеры против вас, а так игра пушка-бомба

ENFIM,E SEM CONTAR OS TROLL MALUCO BUSCA PARTIDA PENSANDO Q EH O ENGRAÇADÃO DA GALERA (HIHIHIHI VO TROLLAR HIHIHI) É UM GORDOLA SUADO COM O SUVACO MOLHADO CHEIRANDO A CHEETOS E PRR SECA E USA ÓCULOS TEM COLEÇÃO DE REVISTA DE HENTAI, ALÉM DO MAIS VC CAI COM UNS MALUCO Q TEM 500 HORAS DE GAMEPLAY E CLICA MAIS Q A PORRA DO S1IMPLE O CARA CHEGA COMO DE DEAGLE ANDANDO NO FULL W SECO SÓ METE 1 CAPA EM TU, MALUCO É O FAMOSO CAGA BALA, 0 MOVIMENTAÇÃO 100% DE HS, ISSO Q ME DEIXA REVOLTADO ESTE PEDAÇO DE FEZES CHAMADO VALVE ANTI-CHEAT, TRABALHADORES DA VOLVO SO PENSAM NO Q? SKINZINHA AGR CRIAR UM SERVIDOR BR PRA AGNT NN CAIR COM ARGENTINO TROLL E O ANTI-CHEAT ND NÉ, KACETA, PERDI O TESAO NO JOGO SÓ JOGO PELO VÍCIO RECOMENDO :D (TO PARTINDO PRO LOLZINHO)
